person.name: Garry Veale
person.bio: Technology veteran & previous EMC EMEA Vice President - who was part of the original/founding EMC EMEA team that was recognised by for both creating a new market category & being the fastest growing technology company of the decade. Expertise around introducing and developing world class, disruptive & game changing technologies â€“ previous experience also includes EMEA Director & VP roles at IBM, HP & Avaya - plus several tech start-ups. Ambassador fell in love with Threefold Sometimes in life - it's about making a stand, calling it as it is & doing the right thing. That's what the ThreeFold Foundation is about - innovation & integrity!
person.excerpt: Technology veteran & previous EMC EMEA Vice President.
